resources.string: This device does not support the S Pen.
You need to install additional S Pen software to use this application. Install?
The installed S Pen library needs to be updated. Install?
A newer version of the S Pen library is available. Install?
Could not initialize the S Pen.
This device does not support the S Pen. You can draw with your finger.
This file is locked by a password
Permissions denied! You will not be able to save your work!
Turn off your phone, and pull out the S Pen!
You may need the following app, to detect S Pen events on custom ROMs.
Click the following button to request root access.
This is used to turn off the screen, without interfering with Smart Lock.
